nodes.text: Prelude to Rebellion 0 was an online preview issue to Dark Horse Comics' comic series Star Wars: Republic. It was written by Peet Janes and published exclusively on the Official Star Wars website in Shockwave format.

It was taken offline later because the file was broken and could not be restored. It was not reprinted in the Prelude to Rebellion Trade Paperback, and Dark Horse Comics editor Randy Stradley has said that the comic will never be printed. Despite this, Prelude to Rebellion 0 was reprinted for the first time in Star Wars Legends Epic Collection: Rise of the Sith Vol. 2.
